snippet: Italian prosecutors are looking into possible corruption involving Saipem’s contracts on oil and gas projects in Algeria.
abstract: Saipem chief executive Pietro Franco Tali resigns after Italian prosecutor's office says it is investigating possible corruption involving firm's contracts on oil and gas projects in Algeria; oil firm Eni has controlling stake in Saipem.
lead_paragraph: Italian prosecutors are looking into possible corruption involving Saipem’s contracts on oil and gas projects in Algeria.

headline.main: In Inquiry, Drilling Company Chief Quits
headline.print_headline: In Inquiry, Drilling Company Chief Quits
